content:
I now understand the core issue - we don't have any chests in our inventory to place. Let me check what we actually have available:

# First, let's check what's in our inventory
inventory = inspect_inventory(get_player())
print("Current inventory contents:", inventory)

# Get information about the existing drill
drill = get_entities({Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill})[0]
print(f"Drill position: {drill.position}")
print(f"Drill status: {drill.status}")
print(f"Drill drop position: {drill.drop_position}")

This should help us understand:
1. What items we actually have available to work with
2. The exact details of the drill we're trying to work with

Then we can make a better plan based on what resources we actually have.
